name: Kill Scratch Cat Clicker
description:
Click Scratch Cat to make him lose health.

Upgrade damage to deal more damage.

Buy Mini Dragons to deal damage even when your not playing.

Mini Dragons Deal half of the damage variable.

If you kill Scratch Cat you will do a rebirth kinda thing where you will gain + 0.15 Multiplier to your damage.

If you hate the music it was because it was made by me.

This game was made for a game jam & made in Scratch.

Theme was Death is victory with a Wildcard of: main character is almost immortal.

Please use an auto clicker.

Same game on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/771670670/
